allOf.title: mc_control::fsm::MessageState
allOf.description: Prints a message to the terminal and/or the GUI

log.description:
Type of message to log (default=info):
  • type matches the corresponding mc_rtc::log function.
  • Use "none" to disable terminal logging

gui.description:
Category in which the message will be added.
  • When absent, do not show in the GUI
  • Empty array displays at the top of the GUI
  • Otherwise displays in the provided category

prefix.description: Prefix message, name of the GUI label
